entry.string: export ORACLE_BASE=/home/oracle/u02/app/oracle export ORACLE_HOME=$ORACLE_BASE/product/fmw12cr3 export ORACLE_SID=dryice export ORACLE_TERM=xterm export MW_HOME=/opt/weblogic1213 export WLS_HOME=$MW_HOME/wlserver export WL_HOME=$WLS_HOME LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/lib:/lib:/usr/lib LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/lib export LD_LIBRARY_PATH export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/bin:$ORACLE_BASE:$ORACLE_HOME:$ORACLE_HOME/bin:$PATH cd /home/dryice2/package/db; echo exit | /home/oracle/u02/app/oracle/product/fmw12cr3/bin/sqlplus -S dryice2/dryice2@dryice @game.sql
